norecaptcha
===========

Python client for the google new No CAPTCHA reCAPTCHA services.

Fork of http://recaptcha.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/recaptcha-plugins/python/
to match the recently updated (Dec 2014) of Google Captcha usage
